Trade/Device Name(s): Cepheid Xpert SA Nasal Complete Control Panel
Regulation Name(s): Assayed Quality Control Material For Clinical Microbiology Assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert SA Nasal Complete Control Panel used as quality control in nucleic acid testing for MRSA and SA detection on the GeneXpert Dx System
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use as external assayed positive and negative quality control to monitor in vitro laboratory nucleic acid testing procedures for qualitative detection of Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus and Staphylococcus aureus on the Cepheid Xpert SA Nasal Complete Assay with the GeneXpert Dx System
